MOVIE OVERVIEW

The films title and primary cast were announce that July, revealing the film's connection to the Mandarin(Leung) and his Ten Rings organization that appears throughout the MCU. Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings is the first Marvel Studio Film with an Asian director and a predominantly Asian cast.
